name: The Portal Realm
description: Official color palette for The Portal Realm organization.

primary.name: Portal Teal
primary.usage: Primary accent glow — portals, hover effects, brand links.

secondary.name: Amber Flux
secondary.usage: Warm secondary tone — contrast highlights and button states.

tertiary.name: Violet Core
tertiary.usage: Supporting brand tone — magic, arcane energy, banners.

dark.name: Realm Stone
dark.usage: Primary dark background — UI bases, footers, shadow layers.

light.name: Moon Dust
light.usage: Text contrast on dark surfaces, soft glows, highlights.

highlight.name: Portal Glow
highlight.usage: Animated glow rings, focus outlines, UI hover radiance.

danger.name: Crimson Rift
danger.usage: Error, warning, or hostile magic energy.
